Subset_Questions.ID: What is the ID of the Subset?
Subset_Questions.Name: What is the name of the subset?
Subset_Questions.LastUpdate: When was the subset last updated?
Subset_Questions.Modality: What is the modality of the subset? (The type of data)
Subset_Questions.Format: What is the format or the schema of the subset?
Subset_Questions.Size: What is the size of the subset? (Number of rows if it's a table or files if it's a directory)
Subset_Questions.Parent: What is the ID of the parent of the subset? (Use 0 if none)
Subset_Questions.Purpose: What is the purpose of the subset?
Subset_Questions.Link: What is the link (URL) to further description of the subset?
Subset_Questions.Covmat: Have you calculated a covariance matrix (or similar) and made it available in this dataset? Where?
Subset_Questions.Modsys: Have you modeled all (or a few) features and made the models accessible in this dataset? Where?

Feature_Questions.ID: What is the ID of the feature?
Feature_Questions.Subset: What is the ID of the reference subset of the feature?
Feature_Questions.Introduction: What is the introduction date of the feature?
Feature_Questions.Name: What is the name of the feature?
Feature_Questions.Values: What are the values that the feature might take?
Feature_Questions.Meaning_NA_NULL_NONE_OTHER: What special meaning does NA, NULL, NONE, or any other placeholder have with respect to this feature?
Feature_Questions.Meaning_Zero: What is the meaning of the feature if it is zero?
Feature_Questions.Meaning_BlankVoid: What does it mean if no value is to be found?
Feature_Questions.Sparsity: What level of non-zero sparsity is there?
Feature_Questions.Mean: What is the mean if the feature is nummeric?
Feature_Questions.Std: What is the standard deviation if the feature is numeric?
Feature_Questions.Modality: How many modes does the feature have?
Feature_Questions.IQR: What is the inter quartile range?
Feature_Questions.ParentIDs: What is the ID of the parent feature (If derived from other features)
Feature_Questions.Unit: What unit is this feature in?
Feature_Questions.Purpose: Why does the feature exist or is it superfluous?
Feature_Questions.Encoding: State whether the feature is encoded and what the mapping is.

Subset_1.Name: Genetics-Processed
Subset_1.Purpose: One VCF file per patient describes the variation in the patients genome with respect to a common reference.

Subset_2.Name: TruCulture_processed
Subset_2.Purpose: Summarized biological readouts from TruCulture: induced cytokine protein levels - the functional outcome related to cell-popoulations/phenotypes and genotypes

Feature_1.Name: STUDY_ID
Feature_1.Purpose: Study-specific patient ID needed to map this subset to the others.
Feature_1.Encoding: All start with "COVIMUN": name of study, followed by "XX": capitalized hospital code, followed by enrollment number at that hospital

Feature_2.Name: DC_SAMPLE_ID
Feature_2.Values: Two sep by _, (4013..inf; integer) representing sample number, (2020..2021; YYYY) representing sample year
Feature_2.Purpose: Unique ID to identify specific DuraClone sample, always connected to a single STUDY_ID

Feature_3.Name: SAMPLE_DATE
Feature_3.Purpose: Investigate longitudinal effect. Can together with STUDY_ID link samples from different subsets taken at the same time/the same date

Feature_4.Name: TUBE
Feature_4.Definition: Identifies the specific flow cytometry tube from which data is derived
Feature_4.Purpose: Each tube has a specific set of antibody markers, enables backtracking from a feature

Feature_5.Name: VAR_NAME
Feature_5.Definition: Identifies the specific cell population and phenotype markers

Feature_6.Name: VAR_UNIT
Feature_6.Values: Many, character/string; count, concentration, or mfi
Feature_6.Definition: cnt: events detected for the given variable, "con": corresponding bloodstream concentration, "mfi": mean fluorescence intensity corresponding to a marker's mean expression level
Feature_6.Purpose: Concentration and mean fluorescence intensity allow for comparison between samples

Feature_7.Name: VAR_VAL
Feature_7.Meaning_NA_NULL_NONE_OTHER: Measurment missing for a random reason e.g. technical error with assay
Feature_7.Meaning_Zero: Cell population/ marker level not present or under detectible level in sample

Subset_3.Name: Duraclone_processed
Subset_3.Purpose: Summarized biological readouts from Duraclone: immune cell popoulation -and phenotype levels - outcome related to genotypes

Feature_1.Name: STUDY_ID
Feature_1.Purpose: Study-specific patient ID needed to map this subset to the others.
Feature_1.Encoding: All start with "COVIMUN": name of study, followed by "XX": capitalized hospital code, followed by enrollment number at that hospital

Feature_2.Name: SAMPLE_DATE
Feature_2.Purpose: Investigate longitudinal effect. Can together with STUDY_ID link samples from different subsets taken at the same time/the same date

Feature_3.Name: TC_SAMPLE_ID
Feature_3.Purpose: Unique ID to identify specific TruCulture sample, always connected to a single STUDY_ID

Feature_4.Name: STIMULI
Feature_4.Meaning_NA_NULL_NONE_OTHER: NULL means unstimulated (control for stimulated samples)
Feature_4.Definition: NULL : no stimulation, "LPS" : lipopolysaccharide (bacterial stimuli), "R848" : resiquimod (viral stimuli), "PolyIC" : Polyinosinic:polycytidylic acid (viral stimuli), "HKCA" heat killed candida albicans (fungal stimuli), "CD3/CD28" T-cell stimulation (direct stimulation)
Feature_4.Purpose: The stimuli correspond to different infectious agents, inducing functional immune responses (cytokine release)

Feature_5.Name: IFNa
Feature_5.Meaning_NA_NULL_NONE_OTHER: Measurment missing for a random reason e.g. technical error with assay
Feature_5.Meaning_Zero: Cytokine protein under detectible level in sample
Feature_5.Purpose: Measurement of variable, potential feature/outcome varible

Feature_6.Name: IFNg
Feature_6.Meaning_NA_NULL_NONE_OTHER: Measurment missing for a random reason e.g. technical error with assay
Feature_6.Meaning_Zero: Cytokine protein under detectible level in sample
Feature_6.Purpose: Measurement of variable, potential feature/outcome varible

Feature_7.Name: IL10
Feature_7.Meaning_NA_NULL_NONE_OTHER: Measurment missing for a random reason e.g. technical error with assay
Feature_7.Meaning_Zero: Cytokine protein under detectible level in sample
Feature_7.Purpose: Measurement of variable, potential feature/outcome varible

Feature_8.Name: IL12
Feature_8.Meaning_NA_NULL_NONE_OTHER: Measurment missing for a random reason e.g. technical error with assay
Feature_8.Meaning_Zero: Cytokine protein under detectible level in sample
Feature_8.Purpose: Measurement of variable, potential feature/outcome varible

Feature_9.Name: IL17A
Feature_9.Meaning_NA_NULL_NONE_OTHER: Measurment missing for a random reason e.g. technical error with assay
Feature_9.Meaning_Zero: Cytokine protein under detectible level in sample
Feature_9.Purpose: Measurement of variable, potential feature/outcome varible

Feature_10.Name: IL1b
Feature_10.Meaning_NA_NULL_NONE_OTHER: Measurment missing for a random reason e.g. technical error with assay
Feature_10.Meaning_Zero: Cytokine protein under detectible level in sample
Feature_10.Purpose: Measurement of variable, potential feature/outcome varible

Feature_11.Meaning_Zero: Cytokine protein under detectible level in sample
Feature_11.Purpose: Measurement of variable, potential feature/outcome varible

Feature_12.Name: IL8

Feature_12.Meaning_Zero: Cytokine protein under detectible level in sample
